name: TestBot 999
description:
I've been working sporadically on this game for the last three months, its not good, its my first game that I will "release". I wanted to make it simple, so most mechanics i had planed where cut down to the really minimum necessary for it to be playable.

It's a simple game about a robot protecting a corrupted energy core from other robots, you can build wall and turrets as defense and the number of enemies increase every wave.

You can find a download of the unity project with all the unused code and assets here (old name was "Project Kickstart").

I'd say to have fun, but you probably won't.

You are welcome to leave feedback, but I don't plan on updating this game, it would only be to help me improve for the next projects.
